definition: to count backwards (from 10 down to 0)/to count down/from the bottom (lines on a page)/from the back (rows of seats)
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: For these reasons, Provo tied for second-to-last inisland rankings published in the November/December 2007 issue of themagazine.
sentences.chinese: 由于这些原因，普罗伏在此榜单上位列倒数第二。

sentences.english: Hernych did create a break point in the penultimate game of the second set.
sentences.chinese: 第二盘的倒数第二局中赫内希觅得一次破发的机会。

sentences.english: He is nearer to his opponents' goal line than both the ball and the second last opponent.
sentences.chinese: 他比球和倒数第二个对方的球员更靠近对手的球门线。

sentences.english: I set my countdown timer alarm for 30 minutes right when I lie down.
sentences.chinese: 每次我按下30分钟倒数计时器闹铃，然后就躺下。

sentences.english: The melting temperatures and heats of fusion decrease approximately linearly with the reciprocals of cluster radii.
sentences.chinese: 团簇的熔点和熔化焓与团簇半径的倒数呈线性关系。

sentences.english: Application of the theme of the penultimate question Deshu counted wrong.
sentences.chinese: 应用题的倒数第二题得数算错了。

sentences.english: Nigeria has a score of 3.5, the second-lowest.
sentences.chinese: 尼日利亚利的分数排在倒数第二位。

sentences.english: Dwarven tradition dictates tha we drink one ale fer each number 'n tha countdown.
sentences.chinese: 矮人的传统是咱们每倒数一次就喝一杯啤酒。

sentences.english: We will meet at Exit A of the Sihe metro station which is located south on Line One (second from the end).
sentences.chinese: 集合地点是一号地铁倒数第二站四河站的A号出口。

sentences.english: What I showed you at the beginning, and then erased, basically justifies how to take the derivative of a reciprocal function.
sentences.chinese: 最开始我讲过了，如何对倒数函数求导。

sentences.english: Opacity is the reciprocal of transmission .
sentences.chinese: 阻光率是透射率的倒数。

sentences.english: But lack of speed in implementation garnered the third lowest rate of satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 但缓慢的运行速度却在各方面满意度中名列倒数第三。

sentences.english: At nightfall of her fifth day on the road, Snoopy was in Chicago, her next- to-last stop.
sentences.chinese: 第五天的黄昏，斯努皮抵达了倒数第二站芝加哥。

sentences.english: The natural logarithms of the separation factors (lnα) of the investigated compounds depended linearly on the reciprocal of temperature (1/T).
sentences.chinese: 氨考察榈的分离因子的对数与温度的倒数成线性关系。

sentences.english: So this just must be the inverse of this.
sentences.chinese: 所以它也应该是它的倒数。

sentences.english: It is the second button down.

definition: position in a ranking of names/place/rank
(coll.) lowest-ranking (student, participant etc)/to rank at the bottom of the list/to finish last
midnight/to order à la carte/(math.) zero of a function
to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
